name: Spiritual Journey
description:
Spiritual Journey Synopsis

Fryä, a female wolf, was infected by a malevolent form of magic. Suffering, the bond between her spirit and body weakens. With the intend to identify the source of her illness, she searches for a shaman in order to cure it. The forest abounds in magic fruits, which are essential to maintain her body alive.

Content

The game contain only one level for now, it will show you a large part of the gameplay present in the game (Jump, dash, teleport, creatures, fruits...).

Keyboard controls Fast Forward Cinematic Move Jump Double jump Dash Xbox gamepad controls Fast Forward Cinematic Move Jump Double jump Dash
